name: Shodown
description:
Super fun game I found on the web. Requires some ninja skills to beat this game and has a fun 'insert coin' mechanic. with all the NFT rage these days, this game presents a nice undertone for how blockchain and games can work together where the user is reminded of the old-penny-arcade machines and rewards for high-scores! If you can beat this game (go through all 3 levels without dying you are a master ninja!) 

Use 'Enter' Key to click on buttons 

Can also be played at https://games.unlimitedcope.com 

If you make the top 10 scores you will be rewarded with 15 COPE 

Has a fun soundtrack also! Very hard to beat! 

If you are new to Solana 

To play the game: 

1) Once game is loaded select Connect Wallet

2) You will be prompted to either create a sollet wallet or connect existing wallet

3) Make sure you have some SOL (this way you can pay the tiny tx fee like 0.001 cents!

4) Make sure you have atleast 0.1 COPE (currently like 7 cents) so you can get some lives to play 

Enjoy!
